basics.name: Israel Fernández Agudo
basics.label: Java Software Developer and Web Developer with 1 year of experience creating Backend and Fronted projects
basics.summary: I have been involved into the world of Software development world for 2 years. Actually I have over 1 year of experience creating web projects on the server side(using Java) as well as on the client side (using html, css ,javascript, react, astro, ...). I have the experience of build a wedding web page too, I created and designed that web frontend and backend. Morevover I have some experience on Android development which I adquired during my Higher Technical Certificate of Software Development.

work.name: Github Frontend, Backend and Full Stack projects.
work.summary: Creation of projects using what i learned during my formation and new knowledge that I adquire every new day about new technologies. I created fronted (using vanilla js likewise vanilla css, as well as using framweroks like React, Astro, Tailwind, Bootstrap etc), backend (Java and Springboot) and some other projetcs using node and C#.

work.name: Freelance web development
work.summary: I led the creation of a wedding website for a client. The web had information about the ceremony and about the couple, the place where it was going to be celebrated and a list of nearby hotels. The page had an assistence form wich data was sending through two Php files into a MySql database. That form was protected by a password and using reCaptchav2. The client side was made using html, css and javascript an on the other side the backend was created using Php, Hostinguer and PhpMyAdmin.

volunteer.position: Manager of Computer systems and creator of facturation Software
volunteer.summary: I contribute to improve the digilatization of my family business. I create it social profiles, managing the computer systems and creating a facturation software (I created it using Java for windows 98).

education.area: Higher Technical Certificate of Software Development
courses: Brand languages and management data systems

courses.title: Java OCA 1Z0-819 Course by Atl Academy
courses.creator: Atl Academy

projects.name: Students system
projects.description: Full stack project that conects a react client side app with a Springboot backend simultaneously to a MySQL database. It manage the data from the students and allows to add, edit, delete or have a detailed view from them.

projects.name: Login/resgiter JWT System
projects.description: Login system with JWT authentification in the private routes. I used Springboot and Spring Security to built it. The final result is an API that can ne used to do CRUD operations with new users through a public route and to check the data (using the private route).

projects.name: Hexagonal Arch. TodoApp
projects.description: A backend system created to be used alongside a TodoApp. It was built using the Hexagonal architecture (or ports-adapters) and Springboot. The application incorporate all the SOLID principles. It conects an external fake API in order to provide info about the users who are doing the tasks.

projects.name: Email sender
projects.description: Backend app that send emails using Thymeleaf. The email uses the gmail account from the user who is using the application.

projects.name: Country Rest API
projects.description: Springboot project that conects an external country API with our own API and saves in a local database the name and population from each country.

projects.name: Personal Web
projects.description: A project that I built as a gift for my girlfriend. I used react and tailwind to create it

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Cheking weather app created using react. It makes a double fecth to WeatherApis from Open weather to show the climate in real time.

projects.name: Film search engine
projects.description: A project built when i was learning react.js. It makes a fetch into a film API and show all the results.

projects.name: User Management (desktop)
projects.description: A project that I built meanwhile I was coursing the programming a access to data subjects. It is a windows form coded in C# that conects and makes CRUD operations in a local MySQL database.
